segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Prerequisites for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Prerequisites for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: There are a few prerequisites for using Store for Business.
segment.target: There are a few prerequisites for using Store for Business.

segment.source: Sign up for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Sign up for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Before you sign up for Store for Business, at a minimum, you'll need an Azure Active Directory (AD) account for your organization, and you'll need to be the global administrator for your organization.
segment.target: Before you sign up for Store for Business, at a minimum, you'll need an Azure Active Directory (AD) account for your organization, and you'll need to be the global administrator for your organization.

segment.source: If your organization is already using Azure AD, you can go ahead and sign up for Store for Business.
segment.target: If your organization is already using Azure AD, you can go ahead and sign up for Store for Business.

segment.source: If not, we'll help you create an Azure AD account and directory as part of the sign up process.
segment.target: If not, we'll help you create an Azure AD account and directory as part of the sign up process.

segment.source: Roles and permissions in the Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Roles and permissions in the Windows Store for Business

segment.source: The first person to sign in to Store for Business must be a Global Admin of the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant.
segment.target: The first person to sign in to Store for Business must be a Global Admin of the Azure Active Directory (AD) tenant.

segment.source: Once the Global Admin has signed in, they can give permissions to others employees.
segment.target: Once the Global Admin has signed in, they can give permissions to others employees.

segment.source: Settings reference: Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Settings reference: Windows Store for Business

segment.source: The Store for Business has a group of settings that admins use to manage the store.
segment.target: The Store for Business has a group of settings that admins use to manage the store.
